Then along comes this younger, stronger gorilla, swinging in, beating his chest, you know. Naturally, the ape ladies come running, presenting their  nice scarlet behinds. Papa ape wants to stop all that but he can't, you know. That's... that's life. I'm not the enemy. The enemy is poachers.

LineA: No, come on.

LineA: Press conferences?

Name: Claire
LineA: I was bigger than you. I was bigger than you, and I was afraid you wouldn't be able to lift me. You were... you were dropping me in practice, and I didn't want you to humiliate yourself...

LineA: I dropped you twice.

Name: Claire
LineA: In front of all of those people.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Three times.

Name: Claire
LineA: You dropped me all the time. Come on. Can't you just forgive me and move on?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Of cour... yes, yes. Yes, of cour... I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Ugh. God, this must seem so petty to you, huh?

Name: Claire
LineA: Well, it's a little silly, But we all have our thing, don't we? I'm just glad you're getting it... Out of you. Are you trying to lift me?! Let me. You are! You're trying to lift me!

LineA: Okay, go get 'em! Good luck! Excuse me... is this seat taken?

LineA: Yeah.

LineA: Oh, Caroline? No. No. Sadly, her parents passed away. I'm her nurse down at the children's hospital. But all of my patients are like family to me.

LineA: Oh.

LineA: Yeah. I can talk about crown moldings and recessed lighting till the cows come home, but nothing compares with that sound right there.

LineA: Oh.

LineA: Ow!

LineA: It's not backwards.

LineA: What happened?

LineA: It's the stupid floors. They're too slippery.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oak. Also known as nature's pillow.

LineA: It's like ice.

LineA: Now, let's not start blaming the floors. You shouldn't have been running.

Name: Luke
LineA: I saw a ghost.

Name: Phil
LineA: G-ghost? Hey... Phil Dunphy. O-kay. That's me. That's acting like a natural shoehorn. Okay. Probably better all take our shoes off for this part of the tour. Follow me.

LineA: She's our little miracle.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Oh.

LineA: I only wish her father had made it back from Afghanistan to see this. Oh! There's our cheering section! Over here, you guys!

LineA: Oh, my god, we have to stop him.

LineA: Expect no mercy.

LineA: Bring it on, big boy.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I-I'm glad dad's proud of Manny. I am. I just... It would have been nice to see him that proud of us. And by "us," I mean "me."

Name: Claire
LineA: And you sincerely thought that the path to dad's approval Was going to be through figure skating? Mitchell, I am fairly confident that dad's proudest moment was when you finally took off the flame-red unitard.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I am not claiming that any of this is rational. I'm... I'm sorry. I'm sorry for being such a pill, okay?

Name: Claire
LineA: I... Actually always felt very guilty for quitting. Look, I know how much you loved figure skating.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I...Never really loved skating.

Name: Claire
LineA: Uh, what?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: um, all right. This is gonna sound a little gay. But, um, when... when you and I skated together, You know, you weren't the mean older sister and I wasn't the... the clingy little brother. We were... we were a team. And, well, let's face it, We've kind of grown apart in the past few years, And... and with mom and dad's divorce, we were on opposing sides, and I just...I... I just... I miss being on your team.

LineA: ...A little gay.

LineA: Let's get out of here. Let's get this thing in the trunk. I can't decide if I'm feeling more proud or mortified.

Name: Jay
LineA: We tell our kids it doesn't matter if you win or lose, but let's be honest, winning feels pretty great. There's nothing like that golden moment in the sun. I think every parent probably wants that for their child. You know, maybe a little bit for ourselves, too.

LineA: Buddy!

Name: Jay
LineA: So, sometimes, we push too hard. And that leads to a lot of resentment and guilt. So, how much is too much? Here's where I come out. Guilt fades. Hardware is forever.

LineA: What is this exciting thrift shop you speak of? Many of my relatives were taken out of their homes to be released into the green pastures in their maturity!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Did you just say "maturity"?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Unhand me, you brute! I regret nothing! I'll pay you. I'm a comfortable man. I've been stealing from your father for days. Oh, is there any better feeling in the world than having your ears flap in the wind?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: You know what? Get out.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You mean it? Sweet freedom No. No, not you, Barkley. Cameron. Out.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey, buddy. Um... Here, sorry. We'll... we'll dribble later. Um...I just, uh, I just want to say I'm sorry. I never meant to blame you for that whole picture thing. Your mom sort of thought it was yours, And I-I should have stopped it, but I didn't.

Name: Luke
LineA: So what was the picture of?  Modern Family

Name: Phil
LineA: Can people change? Well, that's a... tough one that's a tough one but I would say "yes", people can change. That's what I believe, anyway. And I will until the day I die.

Name: Claire
LineA: You do realize you're proving the exact opposite of your point?

Name: Phil
LineA: See, she's changed. She used to be very supportive about me.

Name: Claire
LineA: Come on... Phil!

Name: Phil
LineA: Ow! Why is this so loud?

Name: Claire
LineA: Why is this so loud? Make it stop.

Name: Phil
LineA: I just installed a sweet home theater system at the family room. The trouble is... Claire struggles with technology. Of any kind. I mean, remotes, cell phones, computers...

Name: Claire
LineA: Haley, have you seen my blue...

Name: Dylan
LineA: Hey, Mrs. Dunphy.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, hey, Dylan.

Name: Dylan
LineA: You know I can see you, right?

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, I did not know that.

Name: Dylan
LineA: Haley is just in the bathroom, she'll be back in just a minute?

Name: Claire
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Phil
LineA: What are we pointing at?

Name: Claire
LineA: At the TV.

Name: Phil
LineA: Honey, no, I'm sorry. It's a home theater.

Name: Claire
LineA: What so I - I can't point at the TV when I wanna watch the TV?

Name: Phil
LineA: No. You point at the receiver.

Name: Claire
LineA: What's a receiver?

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay, imagine our home theater system is a human body, so, then, the receiver is the brain. The TV is the face.

Name: Claire
LineA: I know what part you are...

Name: Jay
LineA: So, he says those lies, and a lot many more. His heart Boom! Quadruple bypass, blow the valve.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Hey! Look who it is!

Name: Jay
LineA: Hey, there he is.

Name: Cameron
LineA: What a coinkydink. I was just getting some flowers for Gloria for babysitting Lily.

Name: Jay
LineA: You want me to take them to her?

Name: Cameron
LineA: I would, But I have the most hilarious card for her at home. It's... it's a hunky Antonio Banderas type in silk boxers, and on the inside it says, "thank you for last noche... but I can't find my pantalones." I'm not doing it justice, really. Hi, I'm Cameron.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, geez, I'm sorry. Guys, this is Cameron. He's a, um... a ffriend of my son's. This is, uh, Scotty, Dale, Hugo, and Shorty.

Name: Cameron
LineA: It's nice to meet you guys. You guys look like a scene out of "Jersey boys."

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ohh, so handsome!

Name: Manny
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Manny, are you wearing aftershave?

Name: Manny
LineA: Yes. For my date. This will be the first time she will ever smell me.

Name: Manny
LineA: Her name is Whitney. I met her in an online book club. We both like vampire fiction and the romance of eternal life.

Name: Gloria
LineA: I think it's adorable that Manny has a date. He even picked out the lunch menu. Grilled-cheese sandwich and tomato soup. Tomato soup because, you know that tomato soup is like the blood and the vampires like to eat their blood. and then he wants me to take them out for ice cream, Well, because Manny likes ice cream.

Name: Manny
LineA: Oh, that must be her. If this goes well, you don't need to stick around.

Name: Whitney
LineA: Hi, I'm Whitney. I'm here for Manny. [OPENING CREDITS]

Name: Mitchell
LineB: See how that works?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Sorry, sweetie.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Sorry, daddy. Oh, it's all right. We were just... me and Lily were just using the time to finally figure out how to use the car's voice-command thingy.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Yeah, here, Check it out. Watch. Cd player, next track.

Name: System’s voice
LineA: Say a command.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Cd player, next track.

Name: System’s voice
LineA: Air conditioner on.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Damn it.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Wow, you're worse than your sister with this kind of stuff. It's a good thing Lily doesn't have an ejector seat. Oh, guess what. I ran into your dad and some of his friends.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, really?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Yeah. And get this... He, uh, he referred to me as "a friend of my son."

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Seriously?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Yeah. Well, I wasn't offended by it.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, I am. I mean, w-would he refer to Phil as "a friend of Claire's?" no.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I've heard him call Phil a lot worse. Just let it pass. I should have never said anything.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No, I'm not letting it pass. He needs to know that that's not okay. And if he doesn't like it, he knows where he can go.

Name: System’s voice
LineA: Enter a destination.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Hell!

Name: System’s voice
LineA: Mexican food.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Shut up!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I came out of the closet in my mid-20s. I had to actually come out to my dad three times before he finally acknowledged it. I'm not sure if maybe he was hoping he heard it wrong. Like I had said, "dad, I'm gray."

Name: Cameron
LineA: And my parents, they always just knew. My mother says labor with me took 36 hours because I came out of the womb like this, "hello!"

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Hey, dad.

Name: Jay
LineA: Mitchell. Hey, you guys know my son, Mitch.

Name: Guys
LineA: Hey.

Name: Shorty
LineA: Hey, Mitch. How's it hanging there, buddy? That's a great coat. Where'd you get that?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Um, you know, I don't know. It was a gift.

Name: Shorty
LineA: Really? What is it, suede? Microsuede? Some kind of lambskin? It's very soft, you know?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Thank you. Uh, dad, can I talk to you for a second?

Name: Jay
LineA: Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Be right back. Good seeing you. What's the matter?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Um, "a friend of my son"? That's how you introduce Cam?

Name: Jay
LineA: That's why you came here?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Dad, it's... it's just more than a little insulting. Cam and I have been together for five years. We... we have a daughter.

Name: Jay
LineA: It's... Look at these guys. They look like they came out of the 1800s. You see Hugo over there? After lunch, he ordered a sanka.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No, they're... they're not the ones that are uncomfortable with this. You are. You... You've never been completely accepting of me and now that I have a family, it's getting a little old.

Name: Jay
LineA: These guys don't understand the gay thing. Why create an awkward situation? That's all I'm saying.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: That's weird, because your friend Shorty there... Gay as they come.

Name: Jay
LineA: You got to be kidding.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Mnh, no. My gaydar is never wrong, And it is pinging like we're at a bathhouse.

Name: Jay
LineA: What are you talking about, gay? The guy used to be married.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay, well, that makes... no, well, so did Elton John, Merv Griffin, Cole Porter...

Name: Jay
LineA: Hey, you know what? You know what? Listen to me. You couldn't be more wrong about this.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No, dad, you could not be more wrong... about a lot of things. Good seeing you guys.

Name: Guys
LineA: Yeah! See you!

Name: Shorty
LineA: That's a great coat!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Ping!

Name: Phil
LineA: Phil Dunphy.

Name: Claire
LineA: Hey, it's me.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey!

Name: Claire
LineA: Listen, I've got a bunch of moms over here who want to watch the talent-show dvd, and I can't get the sound to work.

Name: Phil
LineA: Is there a picture?

Name: Claire
LineA: Yes.

Name: Phil
LineA: Be honest. Did you do that thing where you get frustrated and you start pressing all the buttons?

Name: Claire
LineA: No.

Name: Claire
LineA: I have a theory that Phil installs overly complicated things in the house just so he has an excuse to talk to me like a child. Last month, it was the thermostat.

Name: Phil
LineA: *The snowflake button makes it cold, cold, cold. Set temperature" makes it hold, hold, hold, the little flame makes it... *

Name: Whitney

LineA: Here, use my handkerchief.

Name: Gloria
LineA: You see what I mean?

LineA: I'll just be alone for the rest of my life, and that's okay.

Name: Gloria
LineA: No, don't say that. In my country, there is a saying that means, "love is just around the corner."

Name: Gloria
LineA: I come from a neighborhood with a lot of prostitutes.

LineA: Okay.

LineA: I know, right? I said something to the florist, And he said, "oh, don't worry about it. They're gonna me back." they're not coming back. They've crossed to the other side!

LineA: You are a funny man.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, because you're completely bothered by the flowers, But when my father introduces you as "a friend of my son"... Doesn't faze you in the least.

LineA: Because the florist played me for a fool. Your dad didn't mean any harm. He's just being who he is.

Name: call me every Saturday at 6
LineA: 00 P.M. Before people would go out, Just, you know, check in, catch up. And then I think the Christmas of my second year, I finally got up the courage to tell him. After that, I-I pretty much just talked to my mom.

LineA: I'm not crying.

LineA: Okay, okay.

LineA: I am very smart. I had a 4.0 in college. How about you?

LineA: Oh, no. That's the florist.

LineA: Look, relax. Just take them out. I'll get the door. He'll never know the difference. Hi.

LineA: Hi. Yes, uh, come on in. He's... he's over there with the flowers.

LineA: Cam. Cam...

Name: Cameron

LineA: You're not moving your hips. They're frozen.

LineA: Yeah, your hips. They're frozen. Here, let me show you.

LineA: Just bring the club back. Go ahead. All right? Now turn those hips. That's it. You just got to relax. You got to open up the stance a little bit. Spad 'em, spread 'em. That's it. That'. If you don't relax, you're never gonna get that shaft where it belongs.

Name: Phil
LineA: Haley, listen to me. Listen to me. I know this seems impossible, But this is for all those times that mom told you she was right... And you knew she was wrong.

LineA: I'll do it.

Name: Phil
LineA: That's my girl.

Name: Shorty
LineA: You know, that guy's got a beautiful stroke. Look at his pants. No pleats. I like pants like that. You think I can get away with something like that?

LineA: Sure, why not? Listen, Shorty, uh... We've known each other a long time, right? What, 30 years?

LineA: Yeah.

Name: Jay
LineA: And, uh... I sense that you got a secret that's maybe causing you a lot of anguish.

Name: Shorty
LineA: You heard something, right?

Name: Shorty
LineA: Really?

LineA: And I didn't handle it too well, either. And, uh... I just want you to know that you can open up to me, That I'm gonna do all I can to help you.

Name: Shorty
LineA: ...I'm in debt.

Name: Jay
LineA: Huh?

Name: Shorty

Name: Jay
LineA: Wait a minute. You're not gay?

Name: Jay
LineA: Come on, I mean, you're always talking about clothes and everything, right?

Name: Shorty

Name: Jay
LineA: No!

Name: Shorty
LineA: My father landed on Normandy to save your ass. You know, if you weren't lending me 20 g's, I'd knock you out right now.

Name: Jay
LineA: Take a check?

LineA: Cash would be better.

LineA: Let's do this.

LineA: Nice.

Name: Claire

LineA: Wait. Um...

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay. Back to tv.

LineA: Face!

Name: Phil
LineA: Ho! Ooh!

Name: Claire
LineA: Face.

LineA: Dad, w-what do I do?

LineA: Don't panic. We went through this. Just... just think.

LineA: Haley...

LineA: She did it!

LineA: Fine, you proved your point. Everybody in this house is smarter than me.

LineA: What's that supposed to mean?

Name: Phil
LineA: See what I'm saying?

Name: Jay
LineA: Mitchell, it's me!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Hey, dad.

Name: Jay
LineA: Hi.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Hi.

Name: Jay
LineA: I'm here to let you know your gaydar is broken. Shorty is not gay.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No. I, um, I knew that. I just, uh... I made that up to mess with you for dissing cam.

Name: Jay
LineA: What? That cost me 20,000 bucks.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: What do you mean?

Name: Jay
LineA: I reached out to him, you know, to let him know it's okay to be gay.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: You did?

Name: Jay
LineA: Yeah... Right after one of the stranger golf lessons of my life. Turns out what he is is a lousy gambler, And now I'm the one on the hook for it.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, I'm so sorry.

Name: Jay
LineA: Then why are you smiling?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I'm... I'm proud of you, dad. You're growing.

Name: Jay
LineA: Just... just stop it, please? Don't you see how hard this is for me? See, I used to be just like one of those guys. Now look at me. I got a house, looks like little Colombia. I got a gay son and a Chinese granddaughter.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Vietnamese.

Name: Jay
LineA: Only you would know the difference.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay, don't worry, dad. You're not growing too much.

LineA: I'm a little nervous.

LineA: Don't be!

LineA: I'm sure you look beautiful. Whoa!

Name: Whitney
LineA: What do you think?

LineA: Look at you!

LineA: Hi! Sorry for the pop-over, but I just wanted to bring you these to thank you for babysitting Lily again last night. Gracias. You didn't need to do that. You know I love Lily.

LineA: I know.

LineA: Come in. Say hello.

LineA: Hey, Cam.

LineA: Cameron, this is my new friend, Whitney. Whitney, this is Cameron.

LineA: Hello, it's nice to meet you. That... is a spectacular dress.

LineA: This old thing? I don't know...

Name: Gloria

LineA: Oh, my gosh. it's like Barbara Streisand in "the way we were." One of my favorites.

LineA: Me too.

LineA: Okay, who is reading "the forevers"?

Name: Whitney
LineA: I am.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I am so obsessed with this whole vampire thing right now.

Name: Whitney
LineA: Me too!

Name: Whitney
LineA: I just met the sweetest guy named Cameron. I think he might be the one.

LineA: Can people change? I don't know. People are who they are... Give or take 15%. That's how much people can change if they really want to.

Name: Jay
LineA: Well, I'll see you when I see you.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Yeah, thanks for com...

Name: Jay
LineA: Okay.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, well, that's a little, um...

LineA: Yeah, fine, yeah.

LineA: Huh?

LineA: I got some bad news, buddy.

LineA: Well, there's no easy way to say this. Shel Turtlestein is dead.

Name: Manny
LineA: What? How?!

Name: Jay
LineA: I was down here reading the paper, And I heard this commotion up in your room, so... So naturally I go running up there. And this mangy raccoon had busted through your screen. He must have scampered up to where Shel was. By the time I walked in, he had him... The little bastard had him by the neck, shaking him. Gravel's flying everywhere. He didn't even flinch. He just stared at me with that smug look and then bolted. If only I'd have got here earlier.

Name: Manny
LineA: May I see the body?

Name: Gloria
LineA: Baby, are you sure that's a good idea?

Name: Manny
LineA: It's something I have to do. That's him.

Name: Jay
LineA: Sorry, pal.

Name: Manny
LineA: It just doesn't make any sense.

Name: Jay
LineA: Yep. Only the good die young.

Name: Manny
LineA: But in school we lead raccoons are nocturnal. They sleep during the day.

LineA: They sure do, and this one must've got up for a midnight snack. You know, we've all done that.

Name: Manny
LineA: I guess so. Yeah.

Name: Jay
LineA: It all adds up.

LineA: You lie.

LineA: What?

LineA: I'm Colombian. I know a fake crime scene when I see one!

Name: Jay
LineA: I was hanging up the new poster. And it fell on top of him. It was an accident.

Name: Gloria
LineA: You have to tell him.

Name: Jay
LineA: No. I've been through this before. When Mitchell was 9, I was supposed to take care of his bird. It got out and flew into a fan. It was like a bloody pillow fight.

Name: Gloria
LineA: My god. How many pets have you killed?

Name: Jay
LineA: Just the two. I took the heat on the bird. It was a big mistake. To this day, Mitchell looks at me, I see him thinking, "that's the guy who killed Fly-Za Minnelli."

Name: Gloria
LineA: And what if he finds out? Then what? You'll be the guy that killed his pet and lied to him.

LineA: He's not gonna find out, because I covered my tracks.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Okay. Fly-za Minnelli?

LineA: Thanks.

LineA: Yes. I feel awful. Who assumes the worst about people?

Name: Phil
LineA: I first noticed it seven years...

Name: Claire
LineA: You're not.

LineA: I'm such an idiot. Is it...

LineA: Oh, I'll show you. Yeah, yeah, yeah.

LineA: Okay. Thanks.

LineA: So, how are we gonna do this?

LineA: It was funny that morning, huh? When I... when I pulled up next to you at that stoplight?

Name: Mitchell’s boss
LineA: Funny?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Yeah. Because I was on the phone with my partner, talking about how horrible his boss was -- his. And then, uh, you pull up, so...

Name: Mitchell’s boss
LineA: Anyway, I'm glad I ran into you. I'm getting worried they're gonna move up our court date. I-I need you to bust ass preparing. Because if they call us on Monday.... Uh, you need to get that?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No, no, it's... it's fine. I just, uh... picture of my daughter standing for the first time.

Name: Mitchell’s boss
LineA: Yeah, they do that. It's a big day. Anyway, I need you here tomorrow. Now, I know it's a Sunday, but, uh, you think you can be on time, okay?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Actually, um... I-I have plans tomorrow. Uh, so I won't be here. I-I have plans to stay at home with my family and do absolutely nothing, okay. But I will see you on Monday. Mm-hmm.

Name: Mitchell’s boss
LineA: So... so you're in charge now, is that it?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, I-I just figure if my daughter can stand up, then so can I.

Name: Mitchell’s boss
LineA: All right, look... We've all been working hard lately, okay? But that's the job. So either come in tomorrow, or don't bother coming back again.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay. Hmm. Need the, uh, I.D. To...make the elevator go down to freedom! And this, to complete my set.

Name: Manny
LineA: "Turtle. Reptile. Pet. Shel Turtlestein was many things." I don't think I can do this without crying. Maybe we should just get to the cold cuts.

Name: Gloria
LineA: But we want to hear it. Jay, why don't you read it? You were with him at the end. Remember?

Name: Jay
LineA: "Shel Turtlestein was many things, but above all, he was my friend. When I didn't get a date with Fiona Gunderson, Shel was there. when I didn't get to play the part of Tevye, Shel was there. and when a raccoon broke into my room, unfortunately, Shel was there. I said a lot of things to my friend, but the one thing I never got to say was... Goodbye."

Name: Manny
LineB: Stop! I know what really happened.

Name: Jay
LineA: You do?

Name: Manny
LineA: I left a bag of chips near my bed. The raccoon must have smelled it. It's my fault he's dead. Sorry, Shel.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Jay, you don't have anything to say to Manny?

Name: Jay
LineA: yeah. Manny... Shel forgives you.

Name: Manny
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, Denise. Ha! These pictures are amazing. Thank you. Wow. Sweetie, that perm.

Name: Phil
LineA: Technically, it's a Jheri curl. Ohh.

Name: Denise
LineA: I just love to take pictures. I took this one of myself today.

Name: Claire
LineA: You know what? I'm gonna open a bottle of wine!

Name: Phil
LineA: No. No. That's the worst idea. No. No. Oh! What am I, raised by a pack of wolves? Hey, come on, now. Honey... You weren't completely wrong about Denise.

Name: Claire
LineA: How's that?

Name: Phil
LineA: She wants me.

Name: Claire
LineA: To do what?

Name: Phil
LineA: It. Her.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh. Oh, this is because of the thing I said about Facebook and that everybody's hooking up, And now you're disappointed.

Name: Phil
LineA: No. She bit the air right in front of me! Like that.

Name: Claire
LineA: What?

Name: Phil
LineA: And then look what she tried to give me.

Name: Denise
LineA: Anything I can help with?

Name: Claire
LineA: No, I just... I can't find my corkscrew.

Name: Denise
LineA: Ohh. Touch me.

Name: Phil
LineA: O-kay. Denise, I think, somewhere along the line, you got the wrong idea.

Name: Denise
LineA: My head is full of wrong ideas. You have such great taste, Claire.

Name: Claire
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Denise
LineA: I remember Phil used to have really good taste, too.

Name: Phil
LineA: Get a little bit of this.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, here it is. Phil, would you mind grabbing us a couple glasses? You betcha.

Name: Denise
LineA: Need me to grab anything?

Name: Phil
LineA: Nope! Okay, this is so wrong.

Name: Denise
LineA: I know. It's way more exciting when she's in the room.

Name: Phil
LineA: No!

Name: Denise
LineA: I still have my cheerleader outfit.

Name: Phil
LineA: So do I, but this still can't happen. When did that break?

Name: Denise
LineA: Why are you wussing out?!

Name: Phil
LineA: I never wussed in!

Name: Denise
LineA: What about all those things you wrote on Facebook? "how was your day? My neck is so sore."

Name: Phil
LineA: Why do people keep adding voices to these things? I didn't mean anything.

Name: Denise
LineA: Are you telling me that I wasted a year of my life on this relationship?

Name: Phil
LineA: What relationship?

Name: Denise
LineA: How many other women have you led on?

Name: Phil
LineA: Now I don't know!

Name: Claire
LineA: Phil? Phil, honey? Do you remember when you broke your arm when we were first dating?

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah, uh, when I slipped on the ice.

Name: Claire
LineA: Right. That's so weird. Because in this picture, you're sitting with Denise, and you have a broken arm, so...

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah. That's... that's weird.

Name: Claire
LineA: So you were still dating her when you started dating me?

Name: Phil
LineA: No.

Name: Claire
LineA: Phil?

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah. Maybe. Just, there was a time... A little overlap when, uh, I was trying to break things off with Denise.

Name: Claire
LineA: Uh-huh.

Name: Denise
LineA: You took me to Santa Fe!

Name: Claire
LineA: Santa Fe. Phil, you told me that was your father.

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay, I know the pain is fresh, but the lie is really old.

Name: Denise
LineA: You know, this was a mistake. I'm gonna leave. Claire, if I were you, I would kick him out. Maybe he'd appreciate you more after he spent a lonely night in a hotel, at the Radisson, by the airport.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You quit?!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm. It was amazing. No, no, this is the new me, Cam. I am not letting people run my life anymore.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I should be nervous, but I'm... I'm not. I'm excited for you.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Yes! It's exciting. It's exciting.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Because you followed your heart, and that is worth celebrating.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Cam, I just feel...

Name: Cameron
LineA: ha-ha!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: ... so liberated.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Hey!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: And I'm not picking it up.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Ooh! I like this guy!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I do, too. I mean, y-yes, we'll have to... We'll have to cut back a little bit. But isn't it worth it if you feel like you're living your life for the first time?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Totally.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh. What were we even waiting for? You will go back to teaching music, And then I'll -- I'll just find something in a few months! And until then, all we need to do is just sit back and watch this little miracle here dazzle us. I'm tingling.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I am, too.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: It's like my heart is full for the first time in forever. Oh, god, it's really pounding. It's like I feel the weight of endless  possibilities just sitting on my chest. She is not doing anything, Cam.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You're not panicking, are you?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Of course I am panicking!

Name: Cameron
LineA: No! Don't panic. If you panic, I panic!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I just quit my job! Cam!

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh, my god, Mitchell, I am used to nice things! What are we gonna do?!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay, no, no, just calm... calm down. This is what we're gonna do. I am going to... I'm gonna do what I'm trained to do. I am going to lie, grovel, debase myself until I get what I want. I am a lawyer, damn it.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Mitchell! No.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, no, you're right -- the tie.

Name: Cameron
LineA: No, we'll... we'll find something better for you, Something that works for all of us.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: There's no plan "B" here, Cam. We have a mortgage. We have... We have a... a child to support. I...

Name: Cameron
LineA: Hey. It's gonna be okay. We're gonna figure it out. I just want you to be happy, and you will be happy. And that is something worth toasting.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Let's just drink the cheap stuff 'cause we might have to sell that bottle.

Name: Gloria
LineA: It's hard to sleep in a bed of lies, isn't it, Jay?

Name: Jay
LineA: Kids get over these things pretty quick. He's probably sleeping like a baby right now.

Name: Gloria
LineA: I'm sure he's wide awake... full of guilt.

Name: Jay
LineA: Well, I'm going to sleep. Damn it!

Name: Manny
LineA: Hello, Jay.

Name: Jay
LineA: What are you doing up?

Name: Manny
LineA: Waiting. Waiting for what? The truth. It wasn't a raccoon, was it?

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, all right, you got me. I killed Shel. All right? I'm sorry. It was an accident.

Name: Manny

LineA: 500 pounds? What am I, a forklift?

Name: Jay
LineA: To tell you the truth, the call from my brother scared the hell out of me. I decided to get in better shape quick. Didn't want to end up like my old man. Although he did die doing what he loved... refusing service to hippies who came into his store.

Name: Luke
LineA: Manny's the worst roommate ever. Everything he finds, he folds.

Name: Claire
LineA: I know... sweetie, it's only for a few more days.

Name: Luke
LineA: Last night we had a fire drill. Not the hotel. Just us.

Name: Claire
LineA: Hi, guys.

Name: Everybody
LineA: Hey.

Name: Phil
LineA: So, what's today's big adventure? I'll bet the kids want to go with you.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, it is a big one the lavender ranch, Where they grow 45 different varieties of lavender. 45.

Name: Phil
LineA: You hear that, kids? 45 different varieties. Yeah, I can't sell that. Go with god.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh, well, more lavender for us.

Name: Cameron
LineA: When Mitchell and I first met, I may have exaggerated my interest in adventurous travel by implying that I had any. But it's one of the things he loves most about me, And I can't tell him the truth now. It would be like Lewis telling Clark That he didn't like to walk. Side note... We're very good friends with a couple named Lewis and Clark. Clark bought a big, sparkly belt in New Orleans that he calls his "Louisiana purchase."

Name: Alex
LineA: Mom, Haley keeps stealing my ipod.

Name: Haley
LineA: All my music is on my phone. What else am I supposed to do?

Name: Luke
LineA: Manny watches the news. You guys don't even watch the news.

Name: Man
LineA: Aloha. Hi. Sorry, folks. This pool is for adults only.

Name: Alex
LineA: Aw.

Name: Phil
LineA: Don't turn around.

Name: Claire
LineA: What?

Name: Phil
LineA: Trust me. Just keep walking.

Name: Haley
LineA: Wait. Where are you guys going? Guys? What just happened?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Ooh, so, we can drink lavender tea while eating lavender scones.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh, neat. So is this an all-day thing, or...

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, no. I know what you're thinking, Cam. Don't worry - we'll still have time for the whaling village.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Oh. Good. So...

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I can't.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: What?

Name: Cameron
LineA: I-I don't want to go. I know I said I'm not a stay-by-thepool type of guy, but I really am, Mitchell.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: What are you saying?

Name: Cameron
LineA: I'm saying that I like adventure, but not every minute of every day. Can you just go by yourself?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: But the lavender ranch... It's... it's something two men are meant to do together.

Name: Bus driver
LineA: On or off, folks?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, I'm on.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I'm off.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Think about what you're missing, Cam. It's an entire ranch full of lavender.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You're not making the compeling case you think you are.

Name: Jay
LineA: Hey, you little monkeys! No standing around! There you go! Here goes another one! There you go! Here! Here comes another one! There you go! I thought you were one of ours.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Hey, Jay! Be careful. You're gonna hurt somebody...Like you.

Name: Jay
LineA: Don't get too comfortable. I reserved us a tennis court.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Yay.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Thought that one of the advantages of marrying an older guy was that I was going to be able to relax. But all the swimming and running and rowing... It's just like how some of my relatives got into this country.

Name: Phil
LineA: You know?

Name: Claire
LineA: Hmm?

Name: Phil
LineA: You look prettier now than the day we got married.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, honey, and you are even more handsome.

Name: Phil
LineA: I did pushups in the bathroom.

Name: Claire
LineA: you're funny.

Name: Phil
LineA: You're nice.

Name: Claire
LineA: I have always been nice.

Name: Phil
LineA: I've always been funny.

Name: Claire
LineA: Well.

Name: Haley
LineA: Mom? Dad?

Name: Phil
LineA: Ignore her. That could be anyone.

Name: Haley
LineA: Phil and Claire Dunphy?

Name: Claire
LineA: Yes, Haley? Honey, what is it?

Name: Haley
LineA: I'm gonna go get some shaved ice at the hotel next door with some kids.

Name: Claire
LineA: What kids?

Name: Haley
LineA: Just some kids I met at the pool.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, I should go with her.

Name: Phil
LineA: Claire, no. You have to learn to let go. Turning a family vacation into a honeymoon takes commitment. You can do it. Eye of the tiger.

Name: Haley
LineA: Hello?

Name: Claire
LineA: I should at least meet them.

Name: Phil
LineA: No. That is not eye of the tiger.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay. Okay. All right, hey, honey. Go and have fun. And be back in time for your grandfather's birthday dinner, okay?

Name: Haley
LineA: Thank you!

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay! All right!

Name: Phil
LineA: Bye, honey.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, god. That feels weird and good all at once.

Name: Phil
LineA: I know. I was leaning up against that nozzle a minute ago.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Hey.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Hey, you're back. How was it?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, Cameron, it was the most incredible thing I have ever seen in my entire life. Really? And you know who else was there? Who? Elton John. Yes, and he was so blown away by the beauty of it, He sat down at their lavender piano and played "tiny dancer." and we bonded, because he, too, likes adventure.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Did that really happen?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: No, that didn't really happen. I'm just trying to get back at you for bailing on me.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I'm sorry! If it means anything, we've been relaxing here, doing nothing. Maybe you can join us tomorrow.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, I-I can't. I just don't... I don't find relaxing that relaxing.

Name: Cameron
LineA: I understand. You are who you are. Leilani.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: You know what? You know, I-I think it's because of my parents.

Name: Cameron
LineA: It always is. Kipu.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I mean, vacation with my mom and my dad Was them sitting around like statues When, you know, the only thing that me and Claire could do for excitement was... Oh... was, you know, sit around and listen to my skin sizzle.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You poor thing. Sue.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: So that's like... that's why, when I'm on vacation, I want to go out and meet the locals. I want to immerse myself in the culture. You know, I don't want to sloth around all day... Ah, sweet Lady Gaga, that is good. Oh! Oh, thank you. Mmm! What's this called?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Happiness.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Ohh.

Name: Manny
LineA: I'm curious. Is there any sand left on the beach, or did you bring it all up to our bathroom?

Name: Luke
LineA: Sorry, mom.

Name: Manny
LineA: And now you're sitting on my linen jacket. I guess I can't have nice things.

Name: Luke
LineA: Oh. I'm sorry. I didn't know it was there.

Name: Manny
LineA: It's okay. Oh! Luke! Stop! I'm wearing that tonight.

Name: Luke
LineA: I'm wrinkling your linen! I'm wrinkling your linen!

Name: Many
LineA: Ooh! You know what? Out! I want you out! This isn't working! I don't care where you go, as long as you don't stay here!

Name: Luke
LineA: What are you saying?

Name: Manny
LineA: What don't you understand about "out"?

Name: Luke
LineA: Fine. I'll just move in with my sisters. Ooh! Ooh!

Name: Manny
LineA: Oh, no. Who will pee all over the bathroom floor?

Name: Luke
LineA: I was brushing my teeth at the same time. You try to do that!

Name: Cameron
LineA: What did you do today?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I napped.

Name: Cameron
LineA: You did?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I haven't napped in years.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Yeah, it feels good, doesn't it?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Mm-hmm. Good and weird.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Kind of like that one nozzle in the infinity pool.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I wouldn't know. Phil was hogging it.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Is it me, or is Lily more relaxed, too?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, yes. She is. I think it's because she's really picking up on our energy. You know, it's like, if we're tense, she's gonna be tense. And I think we need to bring this new energy home.

Name: Cameron
LineA: It's gonna make us better parents. Lily! Oh! Oh! You let the...

Name: Mitchell
LineA: What? What happened?

Name: Cameron
LineA: You didn't bring her out!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I thought you had her. I thought you had her.

Name: Phil
LineA: Come on. Let me paint you.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, sweetie, that is so creepy. Where is everyone?

Name: Manny
LineA: Okay, let me just say what everyone's thinking. My jacket's a mess. It wouldn't be, But someone used the iron to make grilled cheese.

Name: Luke
LineA: I had bread, I had cheese, and I had an iron. What was I supposed to do?

Name: Phil
LineA: Kids, kids... We don't care.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Hola. Hola.

Name: Claire
LineA: Hi.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey.

Name: Gloria
LineA: I'm sorry I'm late. Where is Jay?

Name: Claire
LineA: He's not with you?

Name: Gloria
LineA: No, he came down a long time ago.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, don't worry. I'll go have a look around.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Oh, he's probably in the ocean trying to pull a tugboat with his teeth.

Name: Claire
LineA: Well, look who decided to join us. And where is your sister?

Name: Alex
LineA: She is in our bathroom throwing up.

Name: Claire
LineA: Well, what happened?

Name: Alex
LineA: You're not going to like this as much as I do, but... She's drunk.

Name: Claire
LineA: I knew I never should have let her go.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Go, go!

Name: Luke
LineA: That's awesome.

Name: Manny
LineA: Guaranteed our bathroom is still messier.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Where is the elevator?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Where?! I don't know! I'm taking the stairs!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Lily, we're coming for you.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey, you. Where you headed?

Name: Claire
LineA: Well, remember earlier, in the pool, when you convinced me to let Haley go next door With complete strangers?

Name: Phil
LineA: And you were totally on board, yeah.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm-hmm, yeah, well, she got drunk, and now she's upstairs throwing up.

Name: Phil
LineA: But she's just a kid. Who would serve her?

Name: Claire
LineA: We did, honey... on a silver platter. Look, you convinced me to relax and let go, and now this happens.

Name: Phil
LineA: I'm sorry, but we... we shouldn't feel bad about wanting a little time for ourselves.

Name: Claire
LineA: Sweetie, this isn't a honeymoon. We have kids. You have got to let this go. From now on, I am not losing sight of them for two seconds. Nothing gets past me.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Did you find Jay? I'm getting worried.

Name: Phil
LineA: I'm sorry. I have to deal with Haley.

Name: Claire
LineA: No. You know what, sweetie? I will deal with Haley. You go see if you can find dad.

Name: Phil
LineA: I'll look for him out there.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Lily, where are you going, huh?

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, my god.

Name: Haley
LineA: I'm so sorry. Oh, my god.

Name: Claire
LineA: Wow, what were you thinking?

Name: Haley
LineA: One of the kids had an I.D., and she bought some drinks.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm-hmm.

Name: Haley
LineA: I tried one and then another one. It was stupid.

Name: Claire
LineA: Yes. Yes, it was stupid. But you are really lucky that this did not end as badly as it could have. This is why we always say to you, "when you drink, you make bad decisions."

Name: Haley
LineA: I know. I know. I just...

Name: Claire
LineA: One minute, you're having wine coolers at homecoming, and the next... The game of "truth or Claire" sweeps your high school.

Name: Haley
LineA: Thanks for not yelling at me.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, honey... That would just be cruel. I'll wait till you feel better to yell.

Name: Haley
LineA: I don't think I'll ever feel better. Does this happen every time you drink?

Name: Claire
LineA: Yes. Yes, it does.

Name: Phil
LineA: Jay?

Name: Jay
LineA: Over here.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey. Hey. What are you doing?

Name: Jay
LineA: I'm stuck. I laid down. My back went out.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, well, don't you worry. We're gonna get you out of here. Grab on.

Name: Jay
LineA: You know, Phil, this might not be the best...

Name: Phil
LineA: No, no, no, no, no. I'm just gonna rock you. Like a hurricane. I'm kidding. You're too old to get that. Here we go.

Name: Jay
LineA: Wait, why don't you just get someone who works here?

Name: Phil
LineA: No, this is gonna work.

Name: Jay
LineA: And...Oh! Ooh, wow! It's spasming. Don't move. Don't move.

Name: Phil
LineA: No. I don't want to get...

Name: Jay
LineA: Um...

Name: Phil
LineA: By the way, I just want to thank you for this trip. It's really been the vacation of a lifetime.

Name: Woman
LineA: Oh...

Name: Phil
LineA: Nothing weird. Aloha. I keep my wallet in my front pocket, so that's... That's what that is.

Name: Jay
LineA: Neck going...

Name: Phil
LineA: I'm sorry.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Anyone! Anyone, help!

Name: Cameron
LineA: Security! Seal off the island!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: This way. This way. Lily!

Name: Cameron
LineA: Lily!

Name: Gloria
LineA: you looking for someone?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Lily. We were so worried. We just got distracted. We're idiots.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ay. Don't beat yourself up. I used to lose Manny all the time. Now I lost your father. These things happen.

Name: Cameron
LineA: She's right, you know.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Did she say my father's missing?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Hmm?

Name: Phil
LineA: We say we'll make time, but life gets in the way. I mean, I know we're parents, But can't we be lovers, too?

Name: Jay
LineA: This may be my worst birthday ever.

Name: Gloria
LineA: There you are.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, hi, honey. Hey.

Name: Phil
LineA: He was stuck in a hammock. It was actually really funny. I was on top of him for like 20 minutes.

Name: Jay
LineA: You need to go now.

Name: Phil
LineA: Good night.

Name: Jay
LineA: Honey. My back seized up.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Yeah, because you overdid it after that phone call about your father.

Name: Jay
LineA: I can't believe I'm as old as he was. Let me sit down here. You'd have liked him, my old man.

Name: Gloria
LineA: I'm sure.

Name: Jay
LineA: And he'd have loved you. My god. That guy was a charmer.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Mm, I know the type.

Name: Jay
LineA: Yeah, we had a lot of fun. But I'll tell you something. Our family vacations were nothing like this here. One week a year in a rented cottage on lake erie, Spiders this big. I just wish he could have seen how things turned out.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Well, if you keep going like this, Maybe you can tell him yourself. Or I can tell him, because you're about to kill me, Jay. My legs, my arms, my back... everything is sore.

Name: Jay
LineA: So, I wore you out, huh?

Name: Gloria
LineA: Oh, no, no, no. Don't get cocky, old man. When I sit down, I can still get up.

Name: Jay
LineA: Hey. Hey.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Okay. Come on.

Name: Jay
LineA: Come here. Come here.

Name: Phil
LineA: The rest of the trip went better. Haley's room stopped spinning.

Name: Claire
LineA: And the monkey?

Name: Alex
LineA: There she is!

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, honey. Do you want some eggs benedict? So creamy. No. No?

Name: Haley
LineA: Mm.

Name: Phil
LineA: Jay got back to the vacation he always wanted. And Mitch and Cam managed to do some sightseeing at a working banana plantation...

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Lily!

Name: Phil
LineA: ...Where they promptly lost Lily again.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Why did you dress her in jungle print?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Because I thought it would be cute!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: She's gonna think she's back in Vietnam.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Lily! Lily, honey!

Name: Phil
LineA: Me and Claire? We... We had a great time. But we never did get that honeymoon.

Name: Phil
LineA: I think I just expected a little too much from this vacation.

Name: Claire
LineA: You were so sweet to try.

Name: Phil
LineA: It was dumb. Like you said, the thrill is gone.

Name: Claire
LineA: I never said that.

Name: Phil
LineA: No, it's over. But wait. Put a few seconds back on the clock. The kid still has a few moves.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, my god.

Name: Phil
LineA: I figured out why we couldn't have a honeymoon. Because we never had a wedding.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, my god.

Name: Phil
LineA: I still can't tell if you think this is lame or cool.

Name: Claire
LineA: I think it's incredibly cool.

Name: Jay
LineA: Looks like I finally get to walk you down the aisle.

Name: Claire
LineA: Daddy!

Name: Jay
LineA: Ow! You better walk me.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay. I'll try.

Name: Minister
LineA: We're here today to celebrate the renewing of the marriage vows of Phil and Claire. On this day, they've chosen to reaffirm their love for each other. You may kiss your bride.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh!

Name: Minister
LineA: I present to you, still as husband and wife, Mr. And Mrs. Dunphy.

Name: Male voice
LineA: …Thank you for choose Continental Airlines. Good night from Maui to Los Angeles.

Name: Claire
LineA: Thank you. You know, honey, if anything were ever to happen to me, I would want you to get remarried.

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm. That was a little fast.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, no. I ju... I just want to make you happy.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay. Any idea of who you would marry if...

Name: Phil
LineA: Vicki Conroy, probably. She works in my office. She's very organized. The kids love her.

Name: Alex
LineA: Are you guys talking about Vicki?

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah.

Name: Alex
LineA: Mom, she's awesome.

Name: Phil
LineA: Just so you know, if something were to happen to me, I...

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, something's gonna happen to you, all right.  Modern Family

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, hey! I had a great time at the game!

Name: Phil
LineA: Thanks.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mwa! Why are you... crunching?

Name: Phil
LineA: Ordinarily, I'm a rule follower, but when someone tells me I can't bring my own snacks into their stadium, that's when I get a little nuts. It's a free country, right? Let's just say it ruffles me... ...when some goobers... tell me I have to spend half my payday...On their hot dogs.

Name: Claire
LineA: Please, just remember the family portrait. We only have the photographer for an hour.

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay? And, sweetie, did you have a chance to try on the white pants I put in your closet?

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, what do they look like?

Name: Claire
LineA: Is there really a more clear way to describe white pants? Sweetie, if they don't fit you, you're gonna be the only one not wearing white, and then you're gonna stand out like "where's Waldo?"

Name: Phil
LineA: Actually, "where's Waldo?" doesn't stand out. He's super hard to find. That's the challenge.

Name: Claire
LineA: This portrait is incredibly important to me.

Name: Phil
LineA: Also, his name is just Waldo. Sorry.

Name: Claire
LineA: I spent weeks trying to find a time that works for everybody and finding the right photographer. So if you could just promise me that you'll cooperate, okay?

Name: Phil
LineA: I promise.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay.

Name: Phil
LineA: This is amazing that you're doing this.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm, thank you.

Name: Phil
LineA: You're wonderful.

Name: Claire
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Phil
LineA: Get in here.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, no can do.

Name: Claire
LineB: Oh. Oh.

Name: Phil
LineA: I love you.

Name: Claire
LineA: Bye.

Name: Jay
LineA: Where's my good underwear?

Name: Gloria
LineA: The question is, why isn't all your underwear good, Jay? You make a nice living!

Name: Jay
LineA: The new maid keeps mixing up my underwear with Manny's. Put on the first thing I grabbed... It was like a crotch tourniquet. You got to talk to her.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Why me?

Name: Jay
LineA: Hola. You both speak the same language.

Name: Gloria
LineA: She's Portuguese. Do you know how offensive it is that you put all of us in the same mixing pot?

Name: Jay
LineA: I'm sorry. Please apologize to her when you tell her not to put my underwear...

Name: Gloria
LineA: I can't talk to her!

Name: Jay
LineA: Hey, guys.

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey!

Name: Jay
LineA: Where's Luke?

Name: Alex
LineA: I'm going instead.

Name: Phil
LineA: Luke suddenly remembered a school project due tomorrow.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, that's tough. But it's a good lesson for the kid. You know, you made a commitment, you got to follow through.

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah.

Name: Gloria
LineA: What is the project?

Name: Phil
LineA: Uh, he has to interview somebody who lived through the 1960s.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, no. Hello. Yeah, Luke. Oh, sure, I remember what I said. Yeah, come on over. All right. Gloria, you're gonna have to take Manny to the game.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Yay. Manny, vamos!

Name: Manny
LineA: I'm still getting dressed! Hey, mom! I think my diet's working! My underwear won't stay up! [OPENING CREDITS]

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, so delicious. Yes. Hey, you're okay with me not going with you today, right?

Name: Cameron
LineA: I have been hired to sing at a wedding this weekend. I was plucked from obscurity after a particularly stirring karaoke performance. So I guess you could say I'm a professional singer now.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I don't know. Well, they're paying you in flowers, so...

Name: Cameron
LineA: Well, I would have blown the money on flowers anyway. They're saving me a step. Plus, all the great divas are rewarded in flowers.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: They're also given paychecks.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: It's just, I'm really bad at small talk, so...

Name: Cameron
LineA: I get it. It's not a problem.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Are you sure? Because you've been quiet all morning.

Name: Cameron
LineA: It's because I'm resting my instrument.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay. I feel tension.

Name: Everyone
LineA: Kobe!

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey, what can I do for you? Do you like being a basketball...Player?

Name: Kobe
LineA: You serious?

Name: Phil
LineA: I choked. I didn't think you'd look up here, at me.

Name: Kobe
LineA: Little preparation next time. It's a mental game.

Name: Phil
LineA: Dually noted.

Name: Haley
LineA: What's wrong?

Name: Claire
LineA: That broken step. It's gonna ruin our whole family portrait.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, here's my idea. I'm really excited about it. The whole extended family, all dressed in white, in a single-file line down the staircase.

Name: Phil
LineA: Oh, like a line on the highway.

Name: Claire
LineA: No.

Name: Phil
LineA: Or a-a ski jump.

Name: Claire
LineA: No. Why... why would I want a ski jump?

Name: Phil
LineA: I don't know. My idea was to have the whole family on a giant bed like in "Willy Wonka."

Name: Claire
LineA: Yeah, but that's ridiculous.

Name: Phil
LineA: Ridicu-licious.

Name: Haley
LineA: I don't see anything.

Name: Claire
LineA: So I'm crazy?

Name: Haley
LineA: No! You're...not.

Name: Claire
LineA: Your father was supposed to fix that step.

Name: Haley
LineA: Mom, you're obsessing over the tiniest little thing.

Name: Claire
LineA: So you do see it.

Name: Haley
LineA: Yeah. What is the big deal about this one picture?

Name: Claire
LineA: Honey, you know what? I don't expect you to understand. But all right. When you're a mom, everything goes by so quickly. in a minute, Luke's gonna be shaving, And Alex is gonna be off at college, And... and you're gonna be... you're gonna be doing something great. Just want to freeze this moment as it is right now. You know?

Name: Haley
LineA: I do. I know I don't show it, but this family's still the most important thing that I... screw it.

Name: Claire
LineA: I'm gonna fix the bastard. I mean, seriously, how hard can it be? If your father can do it, I can do it, right? All right. I just need to... like, lift...

Name: Haley
LineA: Oh. Now I see it.

Name: Claire
LineA: Uh-huh. Mm-hmm.

Name: Phil
LineA: These seats are amazing!

Name: Gloria
LineA: Why you have candy coming out of your pants?

Name: Phil
LineA: No, no, no, no, no, no, no.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Huh?

Name: Phil
LineA: I brought my own snacks. Not because I'm cheap. It's. Plus, I get a little rush from the danger. Be cool! Be cool! Be cool! Just look straight ahead. I've never felt more alive. Whoo!

Name: Cameron
LineA: You're gonna be fine, Mitchell. You know what? Just as long as you don't... Oh, you know what? They're starting. I got to go. Okay. Bye.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: As long as I don't what?! Cam, as long as I don't... Oh!

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, I just made it worse. I'm not freaking out, though. I'm gonna call your dad, And he's gonna tell me how to fix this.

Name: Haley
LineA: "Oh, my God, it's dad"

Name: Claire
LineA: Where?

Name: Haley
LineA: Right there, behind Kobe!

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh!

Name: Haley
LineA: Oh, how weird is this?

Name: Claire
LineA: Quick. Quick. Tell me something to say that'll freak him out.

Name: Haley
LineA: Tell him I'm pregnant!

Name: Claire
LineA: No, I'm not gonna say that. Okay, here we go. How funny is this?

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey, it's Phil. You know what to do.

Name: Haley
LineA: Well, that was pretty funny.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, my God! Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Ohh. Ohh. Ohh. Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh!

Name: Manny
LineA: Ooh, the kiss Cam! Wouldn't it be embarrassing if the camera was on us and then the crowd started...

Name: Alex
LineA: We're related.

Name: Manny
LineA: Not by blood.

Name: Alex
LineA: Touch me, and there will be blood.

Name: Phil
LineA: Not us.

Name: Gloria
LineA: What's wrong with you?

Name: Phil
LineA: It's the kiss-cam... When it lands on you, you're supposed to kiss. It's my wife's dad's second wife, so, legally okay, but still weird. That was awkward. And...we're back.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ay, come on. It's not a big deal.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Excuse me. Excuse me. Sorry for that. Hello?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: There is a pigeon in our house! What do I do? What do I do?

Name: Cameron
LineA: Who is this?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Never funny. Not funny now.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Calm down. You know, I grew up around many animals. One time, a rooster attacked me, and my mom wrung its neck, and we had it for dinner.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Great time for an anecdote. Help me!

Name: Cameron
LineA: It's more afraid of you than you are of it.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Pigeons aren't scared of anything. They stand on electrical wires.

Name: Claire
LineA: Thank God for caller I.D. So you don't have to talk to your wife. Oh, we're gonna talk, mister. We're gonna talk and talk...

Name: Alex
LineA: Dad! Mom saw you on TV! You're dead.

Name: Phil
LineA: Here's the thing. The kiss-cam is only supposed to be for the enjoyment of the people at the game! They never show that on TV. What people do in the privacy of their own sports arena should be their own business.

Name: Jay
LineA: So, in '66, I worked at my grandfather's office-supply business. You know, your ink, your staples, your legal pads. Am I going too fast for you?

Name: Luke
LineA: I fell asleep for second. Did you do anything interesting in the '60s?

Name: Jay
LineA: Well, one summer, I swept up hair at my other grandfather's barber shop.

Name: Luke
LineA: Ugh, you're killing me!

Name: Jay
LineA: What do you want?

Name: Luke
LineA: I don't know. Brian Beckwith's grandfather marched on Washington.

Name: Jay
LineA: Artie Beckwith? He couldn't walk two feet without complaining. He marched on Washington?

Name: Luke
LineA: He told Brian he did. With Martin Luther king Jr.

Name: Jay
LineA: Martin Luther king? Guess who cut his hair.

Name: Luke
LineA: What?

Name: Jay
LineA: Do you know who cut Martin Luther king Jr.'s hair? Neither does Luke's teacher.

Name: Luke
LineA: So, the barber shop was in Washington?

Name: Jay
LineA: Okay.

Name: Luke
LineA: Did you cut any other famous hair?

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, yeah, the Kennedys, Richard Nixon, All the astronauts. How do you think buzz Aldrin got his nickname?

Name: Luke
LineA: Awesome.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: *we love to play in Lily's room, we don't need any milk.* Okay, you know what, Lily? I am a man. I am going into the kitchen to get your milk. Whaaaaaaaaa! Aah! Aah! Aah! Aah! Ohh!

Name: Cameron
LineA: *Ave Maria. Gratia plena. Maria, Gratia plena. Maria, Gratia plena. ave, ave Dominus. Dominus tecum. Benedicta tu in mulieribus et benedictus fructus ventris ventris tui, Jesus, ave Maria*

Name: Jay
LineA: Then one day, Wilt Chamberlain shows up. He says, "Can you take a little off the top for my friend here?" And it's Elvis.

Name: Luke
LineA: No way.

Name: Jay
LineA: Greatest singer that ever lived... after Sinatra. I'll fight any man who says different.

Name: Luke
LineA: My dad says the greatest singer who ever lived is Peabo Bryson.

Name: Jay
LineA: Then I guess I got to fight your dad.

Name: Luke
LineA: Yeah. I guess.

Name: Alex
LineA: Luke says grandpa wants to fight you.

Name: Claire
LineA: Why does everything have to suck?!

Name: Haley
LineA: Let's just do the picture another day. I think I'm getting a pimple.

Name: Claire
LineA: No! Do you know how long it took me to book this photographer? Maybe by the fireplace.

Name: Haley
LineA: Yeah. That's a classic old-person spot for a portrait.

Name: Claire
LineA: Yeah, if I'd ever bothered to paint that hideous Wall.

Name: Phil
LineA: Claire is a perfectionist, Which sometimes is a good thing, Like when it comes to picking a husband. Sometime it's a bad thing, Like when, uh, everyone else sees something beautiful, And all she sees is the teeny, tiny flaw.

Name: Claire
LineA: No. No. No. Hi. My house is a disaster. Can we do this picture at your place?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Yeah, yeah, that's... that's not gonna work.

Name: Claire
LineA: Maybe one more layer... and tight, really tight. Dad, can you call them again?

Name: Jay
LineA: I just did. They're on their way. Game went into overtime.

Name: Claire
LineA: I know, but we're losing the light, And the photographer has got to get to a bar mitzvah in 10 minutes. Oh, red wine. Really? Now?

Name: Jay
LineA: You know, honey, I think you're getting a little too uptight about this.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm-hmm.

Name: Luke
LineA: It's hard to breathe. Oh, you're fine.

Name: Jay
LineA: What'd you do to him? He's turning blue.

Name: Claire
LineA: Yeah, but his clothes will stay white.

Name: Gloria
LineA: We're home!

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, thank God!

Name: Phil
LineA: Hello!

Name: Gloria
LineA: Manny, let's go change. Mwah!

Name: Phil
LineA: Hey. There's my beautiful wife. I know you're mad at me, and I know this foam finger can't map for everything...

Name: Claire
LineA: Honey, you just go change, and we'll talk about what you did later.

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay. Hey... Thank you so much for those tickets.

Name: Jay
LineA: Gloria tells me you had a real good time.

Name: Phil
LineA: Not really. No, I didn't. God, I love your daughter. Ohh! I should... I should come by and kiss that step... fix that step.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Ugh, you're acting like I wanted to destroy the house.

Name: Cameron
LineA: No, I just think it's odd that the majority of things you destroyed were sent to us by my mom.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, okay, okay, okay, So while I'm fighting off that filthy creature, I actually stop and say, "oh, you know what? Here's the opportunity I've always been looking for "To destroy our kitschiest objects."

Name: Cameron
LineA: "kitschiest"? Oh, she's gonna love that. You know, if you would have just come with me to the wedding, none of this would have happened.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay, so you are angry.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Mitchell, I get it. You're terrified of small talk...and birds. You're just lucky that pigeon didn't want to chat you up about the weather. Hello, Jay.

Name: Jay
LineA: Hello, guys.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, God! Oh, you look like the guy from "dance fever"!

Name: Phil
LineA: Thank you.

Name: Jay
LineA: Deney Terrio. Cleveland, Ohio.

Name: Claire
LineA: Dad, really. That is not a compliment. That's why I wanted you to try those on earlier. Turn around.

Name: Haley
LineA: The picture can't happen today. My pimple's getting worse.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, honey, I am so sorry. Can you stand?

Name: Haley
LineA: Yeah?

Name: Claire
LineA: Well, then, the picture's happening.

Name: Haley
LineA: It's all anybody's gonna see!

Name: Claire
LineA: I wouldn't be so sure about that. Did you get a look at her dress?

Name: Phil
LineA: What?! Why would I look at her dress? I love you!

Name: Photographer
LineA: Uh, Mrs. Dunphy. The sun is setting.

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, okay, yeah, this is happening. Everybody, come on, let's go.

Name: Jay
LineA: Hold it. Be careful. I stained some furniture out there this afternoon.

Name: Claire
LineA: Of course you did, dad. Anything else I need to know about? Maybe the neighbors on either side are having a paintball fight. Now, watch this. Dad, in his infinite wisdom, stained furniture today. Don't touch it. It's wet. Hurry, hurry!

Name: Phil
LineA: Put that down, sweetheart.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, okay, we got it. Now we're gonna go out here. We're ready. Oh, my God! Are you kidding me?!

Name: Jay
LineA: Ay. All right, how do you... How do you turn the sprinklers off?

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ay, of course, because I'm Latina, I'm supposed to know everything about gardening and sprinklers!

Name: Jay
LineA: You were here when they installed it!

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ay, yeah. Ay... The box is across the yard.

Name: Claire
LineA: You mean the now-soaking-wet yard? That's great. We are screwed.

Name: Phil
LineA: No, we're not. We haven't unwrapped our secret weapon yet. Luke walks over there, "hurt locker"-style, Flips the switch, and boom!... Or, not boom... water off. Put the "he" in "hero," son.

Name: Claire
LineA: Ohh.

Name: Cameron
LineA: "hurt locker." It's... it's more like "squirt locker." Really? That wasn't funny? I actually pity you guys.

Name: Claire
LineA: No! No time to celebrate! Stop it! We don't have a lot of time.

Name: Photographer
LineA: All right, everybody, if I can have the little ones out front...

Name: Claire
LineA: You know what, sir? If you don't mind... I've got this. Come on, people. Let's get out here. Haley, Alex, I need you to unwrap your brother, all right? I need the Dunphys over on this side. Dad, you're in the middle. Mitchell, Cam, Lily on this end.

Name: Phil
LineA: Okay. Listen.

Name: Claire
LineA: Uh-huh?

Name: Phil
LineA: I know I screwed up, But if ever you're in my arms again...

Name: Claire
LineA: Phil, not now.

Name: Phil
LineA: Yes, now! I don't want to look at this picture when I'm 80 years old and you're long dead and know that you were angry at me When we took it!

Name: Claire
LineA: Phil, we'll talk about what you did later.

Name: Photographer
LineA: Okay, everybody. Eyes over here.

Name: Phil
LineA: I didn't do anything. She kissed me.

Name: Claire
LineA: What?! Who kissed you?

Name: Phil
LineA: Gloria.

Name: Jay
LineA: What?!

Name: Gloria
LineA: It was the kiss-cam.

Name: Jay
LineA: Why did you kiss Cam?

Name: Gloria
LineA: No, I kissed Phil. He told me I had to.

Name: Phil
LineA: No. No.

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay. Hang on a second. Was this before or after you ignored the phone call from your wife?

Name: Phil
LineA: You saw that, too?!

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm.

Name: Jay
LineA: Could we please just take the damn picture?!

Name: Photographer
LineA: Okay, everybody, one more time.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Just so you know, I am angry with you.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: I knew it!

Name: Claire
LineA: Oh, damn it!

Name: Cameron
LineA: It was a big day for me, and he didn't to go because he doesn't like small talk!

Name: Claire
LineA: Would it be terribly inconvenient to just postpone this hissy fit for a few minutes?

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Okay, you know what?! Maybe some of us don't want to take a picture today!

Name: Haley
LineA: Thank you!

Name: Cameron
LineA: Yeah, and, please, Claire, don't try to make Mitchell do something he doesn't want to do.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Oh, shut up, Cam!

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, stop it! Stop it! Everyone! Listen, this took me forever to put together, So I don't really care who kissed who and who's got a pimple on her head, And who is wearing an  outrageously inappropriate dress! We are gonna get together and act like a normal family for 1/10 of a freaking second, and we're gonna do it right now. Come on, let's go.

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Get your hands off or me!

Name: Claire
LineA: No. No, make me. Make me. Make me.

Name: Jay
LineA: Oh, this is ridiculous! You're both uptight about everything! You didn't want to go to a wedding with him because you didn't want to make small talk? That's how I met Gloria. Do you remember the first thing I said to you?

Name: Gloria
LineA: Yes. "I like chocolate, I like fruit, But not together."

Name: Jay
LineA: You couldn't come up with that, Ivy league? And you... you would be a lot happier If you weren't so obsessed with everything being perfect. Look at us here all in white. What are we, a cricket team? News flash... life is not perfect, Claire. Now, calm the hell down!

Name: Claire
LineA: Okay, dad, that's great. And that's really easy for you to say, But do you think I like being like this? No, I don't. So if you have some quick and easy fix, Why don't you just give it to me right now? Ohh! Oh! Oh! Oh, my God!

Name: Phil
LineA: I-I got this, baby.

Name: Claire
LineA: No! What are... Why did you do that? Two people are dirty!

Name: Mitchell
LineA: Well, three.

Name: Cameron
LineA: Okay, you know what? That's for "kitschy."

Name: Luke
LineA: Mud fight!

Name: Claire
LineA: No. Don't do that!

Name: Photographer
LineA: Excuse me! Are we still doing this?

Name: Claire
LineA: No. No, we're not. Now we are.

Name: Gloria
LineA: Ready!

Name: Luke
LineA: Whoo-hoo!

Name: Manny
LineA: Aah!

Name: Photographer
LineA: Say "cheese."

Name: Gloria
LineA: Say "cheese!"

Name: Jay
LineA: Back in '68, when I was sweeping up hair in that barber shop, I had this mental picture of the family that, If I was lucky enough,  one day I would end up with... Perfect wife, perfect kids. Guess what. I didn't get any of that. I wound up with this sorry bunch. And I'm thankful for that every day. Well, most days.

Name: Luke
LineA: I think I'm just gonna go with the Elvis stuff.

Name: Jay
LineA: Yeah, I would.

Name: Claire
LineA: To the right...To the right...And a skosh to the left. There we go. Whatever. I'm gonna have to take the picture down when I repaint the wall anyhow.

Name: Phil
LineA: Kill me now.

Name: Claire
LineA: What?

Name: Phil
LineA: Don't know how... I got so lucky.

Name: Claire
LineA: Mm-hmm?

Name: Phil
LineA: I love you.

Name: Claire
LineA: I love that picture.

Name: Phil
LineA: Yeah.

Name: Claire
LineA: Is that a chip on the frame right there?

Name: Phil
LineA: No. No.

Name: Claire
LineA: I can see it.

Name: Phil
LineA: Honey!
